name: High Grade Miner
description:
Board the mining machine and get ready to dig for the motherload!

Become a miner and explore a vast underground world filled with various gems and ores. Use items such as dynamite to help blast your way down and use a teleporter to go back up the surface to sell your ores and gems! However, be careful that you don't take too much damage or run out of fuel as all your preciously mined materials will disappear from your cargo hold.

  • Use items like C4 or a teleporter to help your expedition!
  • Upgrade your mining machine to drill faster, dig deeper, and move faster!
  • Lots of gems and ores to mine, varying from petty coal to coveted diamonds!
  • Each world is randomly generated, no two world will be the same!
